EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-11-28 Per Se event invite.ES-2018-11 NYC event invite email
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Turbonomic at Michelin 3-star restaurant Per Se in NYC!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}!
We'd like you to join us for at Michelin 3-star restaurant, Per Se in New York City for an evening of networking and a five-course award-winning meal on Wednesday, December 12th.
Come hear success stories and learnings from industry-leading IT executives at the forefront of this transformational journey. You will walk away equipped with answers and principles to implement an effective hybrid clod strategy.
RSVP: Hybrid Cloud Event - New York City <[[https://turbonomic.com/new-york-vip/]]> Per Se 10 Columbus Circle, New York, NY 10019 Wednesday, December 12 at 5:30 PM
Best, Turbonomic Team
